name: Toptradingstocks
0:
”Alexa, ask top trading stocks about top trading stocks”
”Alexa, ask top trading stocks about top twenty five trading stocks”
”Alexa, ask top trading stocks for information about top twenty five trading stocks”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: top trading stocks
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Top trading stocks provides the daily top 25 trading stocks on the Toronto, Canadian, New York, Nasdaq stock exchanges with volume and price, as well as information on interesting stocks.

The top trading stocks by volume information is gathered from information sources and stock exchanges that are relied on and considered to be reliable, there is no guarantee of the accuracy of the information as the skill relies on third party information that is considered accurate. As well the synopsis information is gathered from the companies websites and news releases and again it is third party information summarized and some of the information may be opinion, so the sources are considered reliable and accurate but there is no guarantee the information is accurate.

The top trading stocks information is gathered from third party service providers or the stock exchanges and some cases is in 15 minute delay and the information gathered is from a specific moment during the trading day and the information is supplied from the top trading stocks skill from that time and day, which time and day is mentioned by Alexa. With active trading markets, and news releases constantly being issued by any company, the top trading stocks change frequently. 

Top trading stocks skill is updated daily, and may be updated multiple times a day, each update will have Alexa preface that time and date before relaying the top trading stocks.

The synopsis feature is an in-skill purchase option. The synopsis feature will provide a synopsis of the top trading companies, such as recent news releases and, or information on the operations, there may be opinion also offered in the synopsis but no opinion to purchase any stock nor any recommendation to purchase a stock will ever be provided on the top trading stocks skill.

It is always recommended to do your own research and to do your own due diligence, no one involved with the top trading stocks skill makes any recommendations to buy or sell, and none of the information providers of the top trading skill are registered representatives or licensed stock brokers.

Top trading stocks skill also provides interesting stocks throughout the skill. These may be stocks personally owned by principles or associates of the skill, as well as the top trading stocks that are trading may be owned by the principles and associates of the skill, as well principles or associates may be trading the interesting stocks, the top trading stocks as well, but no recommendations to buy or sell are ever made in the skill.

All information in the top trading stocks skill is garnered from the companies or third party service providers and is considered to be reliable however there is no guarantee the information is accurate. Do your own due diligence.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
